title: ___>>►🏠Roommate Wanted for House Apartment◄<<
posting_body: ['*** Dont Miss Out.', "Won't Last!", '*', '**', '1 Room Available for August 1, 2022 Occupancy.', 'Near Brighton Center and approximately 20 minutes from downtown Boston.', 'Roommate Wanted for a 4 Bedroom House Apartment to share.', 'Modern Kitchen and Bathroom.', 'Near public transportation and T. Convenient 5 minutes walking to shopping and dining.', 'Rent is $550.00/mo.', 'Please Call Theresa 617-254-1899 and leave a message any day of the week between 8am and 8pm.', 'Only single room occupancy, NO room sharing.', 'Sorry.', 'Amenities Include;', '- Cable and Internet Ready', '- 5 minutes walk to trains', 'T- Green Line and All Bus Lines', '- 10 minutes walk to Shopping and Dinning', '- 10 minutes walk to PlayGround / Park', '- Convient to;', 'Boston College (1 mi)', 'St. Elizabeth Hospital (1 mi)', 'Cleveland Circle / Brookline (2 mi)', 'Boston University (3 mi)', 'Allston Nightlife (3 mi)', 'Downtown Boston (5 mi)', 'Please Call Theresa 617-254-1899 and leave a message any day of the week between 8am and 8pm.', 'Thanks for looking!', '=D']
